pages.text: 92|15|del kmean anaknea chaul tow knong noh  krawpi chn touchcharit
92|16|delke ban bdeseth( nung anakneasar)  ning ban berchenh ( pi chomnue leu a l laoh) noh laey .
92|17|haey ke nung banhchiesa anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ampi vea( nork)
92|18|del brichcheak tropy sa mb tde robsa ke daembi saamatakhluon .
92|19|haey ke min trauvkar kar tabasnang nie k meat pi anaknea mneak  laey .
92|20|leuklengte daembi svengork kar ylprom pi mcheasa robsa  ke da mha utdongk utdam bonnaoh .
92|21|haey ke pitchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan( avei del yeung  tabasnang dl ke) .
93|1|a l laoh sbath nung pelopruk .
93|2|ning peloyb  nowpel del vea ngngut .
93|3|mcheasa robsa anak( ao mou ham meat)  minban baohbng anak ning  minban saabkhpaem anak laey .
93|4|chea karpit nasa  thngai barlok brasaer samreab anak cheang lokey nih towtiet .
93|5|haey mcheasa robsa anak pitchea nung bratan( nie k meat)aoy  anak .  haey anak brakadchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan .
93|6|tae trong min bankheunh anak( mou ham meat) chea kaunkamprea  ning ban  theroksaa anak te ryy
93|7|haey trong bankheunh anak v nge  vng  ruoch trong ban changaoulobangheanh  phlauv dl anak te ryy
93|8|haey trong bankheunh anakchea anakakr  ruoch trong ban thveu aoy anak  mean ban te ryy
93|9|dau che  neah  chaur anak kom kiebasangkot champoh kaunkamprea aoy saoh .
93|10|haey chaur anak kom koumhk champoh anaksomtean aoy saoh .
93|11|rie nie k meat del mcheasa robsa anak ban bratan aoy noh  chaur anak riebreab( doengkoun) .
94|1|tae yeung minban baekchamh troung robsa anak( mou ham meat) aoy anak
94|2|ning ban dk bantouk robsa anak chenhpi anak
94|3|del ban phtok yeang thngon now leu khnang robsa anak
94|4|haey yeung ban leuk ke tde neam robsa anak aoy khpangkhpasa te ryy
94|5|haey pitabrakd nasa  cheamuoynung sechakdei lombak vetnea  ku pheap ngeayosruol .
94|6|pitabrakd nasa  cheamuoynung se ch kei  d lombak vetnea ku pheap  ngeayosruol .
94|7|dau che  neah  nowpel del anak ban bampenhphearkechch(kechchakar  lokey) ruochreal haey  chaur anak khetkham korp sakkar champoh yeung .
94|8|haey tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak temuoyokt  chaur anak bng  brathnea ning sangkhum .
